detail.description: Incorporated in 2022, Jain Resource Recycling and its subsidiaries specialize in recycling non-ferrous metal scrap and producing lead, copper, and aluminium alloys. Its lead ingots are London Metal Exchange-registered, ensuring international quality standards. The company also trades non-ferrous metals and commodities.[1]
